Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Civilization CollapseÃ¢â‚¬Å“ will be released on 7Ã¢â‚¬Å“ vinyl (retail version: black Ã¢â‚¬â€œ cover1 // Nuclear Blast Mailorder only: red, yellow, white Ã¢â‚¬â€œ cover2) and as digital download on November 9, 2012 and will contain the super rare non-album track, Ã¢â‚¬Å¾WolfchildÃ¢â‚¬Å“, which was released earlier this year on the JOHN SINCLAIR tribute sampler, Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Dark SymphoniesÃ¢â‚¬Å“.

The band also made a video clip for Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Civilization CollapseÃ¢â‚¬Å“ which is mainly about the riots that took place in Greece most recently.

While researching about said riots the KREATOR art direction team became aware of Marios Lolos, president of the Greek union of journalistic photographers. In the past Greek photographers have become victims to police brutality quite often, and Marios himself barely got out alive out of one these extreme and undemocratical attacks. When KREATOR showed Marios both song and lyrics, he immediately agreed participate by offering parts of his huge photographic archives.
